user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for comfortable and breathable underwear that would provide support and keep me cool during daily activities.
purchase_reason: I was looking for comfortable everyday underwear that would keep me cool and dry throughout the day. The features such as the mesh fly for ventilation and moisture-wicking capabilities were particularly appealing. The positive rating and the review indicating a good fit also influenced my decision, despite the minor concern about sweat retention.

I was attracted to the promise of premium comfort and the innovative cooling channels. However, my experience was disappointing due to sizing issues, which made the product uncomfortable. This led me to rely on the product description and the brand's reputation, but ultimately, the fit did not meet my expectations.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that are soft, comfortable, and well-sized, as I value quality materials and a good fit. I appreciate items that are easy to care for and have practical features like pockets. Additionally, I tend to favor products that are made from sustainable materials and offer durability. On the other hand, I dislike items that are poorly sized, lack essential features like pockets, or do not meet my expectations in terms of comfort and quality. I also find it frustrating when products do not hold their shape or softness after washing.

conversation.content: I want comfortable and breathable underwear that provides support and keeps me cool during daily activities. within my expected price range: [23.98, 27.59]
What specific size or fit do you prefer in your underwear?

I prefer underwear that is well-sized and fits comfortably without being too tight or too loose. It's important to me that the underwear provides good support and stays in place throughout the day. Ventilation and moisture-wicking capabilities are also key for keeping me cool and dry during daily activities.
What specific style of underwear do you prefer, such as briefs, boxers, trunks, or another style?

I generally prefer boxer briefs for underwear as they offer a good balance between support and comfort. The longer leg provides coverage and prevents chafing, while the snug fit keeps everything in place. The style allows for flexibility in movement and is well-suited for daily activities. Breathability and moisture-wicking properties are crucial features for me to stay cool and dry throughout the day.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <C9 Champion Men's Boxer Brief (Available in Long & Regular Length)> / Item ID: B07TVP26SQ / Price: $25.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Underwear', 'Boxer Briefs'] / Description: ['Designed for all day comfort and versatility. Moisture wicking fabric and waistband for cool and dry comfort. Lightweight, flexible fabric supports you as you move.'] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Hanes Men's Boxer Briefs, Cotton Stretch Moisture-Wicking Underwear, 6-Pack> / Item ID: B0C6JDX8V5 / Price: $24.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Underwear', 'Boxer Briefs'] / Description: ["This men's boxer briefs multipack is made from soft and breathable stretch cotton that moves with you, thanks to our Cool Comfort® fabric. Our experts designed them with a Comfort Flex® waistband that flexes and moves with you. Each pair of boxer brief underwear has a no-ride-up design, so they'll stay put no matter what your day holds. Plus, you can throw them right in the washer when they need a quick refresh. And our favorite feature part of all? These men's black boxer brief underwear sets have different waistband colors and also come in multiple size options, from Small to extended sizes like 3XL, so you can choose the one that works best for you."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <ZLYC Mens Long Leg Cotton Boxer Briefs Fit Underwear, 3/4 Pack> / Item ID: B079L3M5NM / Price: $22.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Underwear', 'Boxer Briefs'] / Description: ['This mens boxer briefs will keep you comfortable all day long. Made of 95% premium combed cotton, comfy, breathable, softer and stronger than standard cotton. It has wide elastic waistband that offers a comfortable fit in every situation. Tag free and no ride ups are always a must. Plus, the contour pouch gives your stuff the support it needs and cosy room. Order now and enjoy the comfort of this classic!', 'Material', ': 95% Cotton and 5% Elastan', 'Size', ': Tag M=32-34 Inches Tag L=36-38 Inches Tag XL=40-42 Inches', 'Washing Instruction', ': 1. Machine wash warm with like colors2. Use only non-chlorine bleach when needed.3. Tumble dry medium.4. Cool iron if needed.', 'Satisfaction Guarantee', ': If any problem, please feel free to contact us and we will work hard towards your 100% satisfaction (new replacements or refund)']
